dt: {bc}a permission granted by competent authority to engage in a business or occupation or in an activity otherwise unlawful
{bc}a document, plate, or tag evidencing a license granted
{bc}a grant by the holder of a copyright or patent to another of any of the rights embodied in the copyright or patent short of an assignment of all rights
{bc}freedom that allows or is used with irresponsibility

dt.t: Freedom of the press should not be turned into {wi}license{/wi}.

dt: {bc}deviation from fact, form, or rule by an artist or writer for the sake of the effect gained

pt: {sc}freedom{/sc} {sc}liberty{/sc} {sc}license{/sc} mean the power or condition of acting without compulsion. {sc}freedom{/sc} has a broad range of application from total absence of restraint to merely a sense of not being unduly hampered or frustrated.
{sc}liberty{/sc} suggests release from former restraint or compulsion.

pt.t: the released prisoner had difficulty adjusting to his new {it}liberty{/it}

pt: {sc}license{/sc} implies freedom specially granted or conceded and may connote an abuse of freedom.

pt.t: freedom without responsibility may degenerate into {it}license{/it}

et: Middle English, from Anglo-French {it}licence{/it}, from Latin {it}licentia{/it}, from {it}licent-, licens{/it}, present participle of {it}licēre{/it} to be permitted
shortdef: a permission granted by competent authority to engage in a business or occupation or in an activity otherwise unlawful

dt: {bc}to permit or authorize especially by formal license

shortdef: to permit or authorize especially by formal license
to give permission or consent to : allow

dt: {bc}a plate or tag (as of metal) attesting that a license has been secured and usually bearing a registration number

shortdef: a plate or tag (as of metal) attesting that a license has been secured and usually bearing a registration number

dt: {bc}the numbers and letters on a vehicle's license plate

shortdef: the numbers and letters on a vehicle's license plate

dt: {bc}a license issued under governmental authority that permits the holder to operate a motor vehicle

shortdef: a license issued under governmental authority that permits the holder to operate a motor vehicle

dt: {bc}a way of making a large amount of money very easily

dt.t: He says that if the new law is passed it will give these companies {it}a license to print money{/it}.

shortdef: a way of making a large amount of money very easily

dt: {bc}a legal document that is needed for a marriage to occur

shortdef: a legal document that is needed for a marriage to occur

dt: {bc}in a business arrangement where one company gives official permission to another company to do or make something

dt.t: The company makes computer chips {it}under license{/it} from the original manufacturer.

shortdef: in a business arrangement where one company gives official permission to another company to do or make something

dt: {bc}a license plate bearing letters or numbers designated by the owner of the vehicle

shortdef: a license plate bearing letters or numbers designated by the owner of the vehicle —called also vanity license plate
